page.title: 05Ecology
page.content: Man has changed our D block drastically. At one time the the Wirral was probably part of a{large forest . However many rich people wanted to make more money and one perfect way to make more money is by useing the land .This meant the trees and bushes that had been the habitat for many animals over the years was cut down.People began to build and many estates have sprung up.Many buildings were built,animals ran to the few safe places.Big diggers made roads and shops.Farm land was bought and built on.Small parks were set up, but the owners wanted more money and so they built on the country.There are now country parks.Rangers protect the land.Many animals,plants and birds are recovering. { {
